node.name: SOA Designer (Indigo version)
node.shortdescription:
SOA Designer allows the modeling of service layer by focusing on the description of Component, Service, Contract used in the SOA paradigm.

This module uses a dedicated SOA metamodel provided by Obeo Network community and it implements the following diagrams:

  • SOA Diagram
  • Component Contract Diagam
  • DTO View
  • DTO / Entity Binding

This modeling tool can be used in conjunction with other designers:

  • Cinematc Designer for UI cinematic
  • Entity Designer for domain model
  • Graal Designer for UI interaction (entry specifications from business specifiers)

You can also generates your application with your own generators or apply this ready-to-use Spring generator: Acceleo JavaEE Generators.

This designer is free (open-source with EPL license).
You can easily modify it with Obeo Designer to adapt each diagram to your needs or combine it to your own DSL. To start customizing this module, just download a free trial version of the architect edition and import the source code of SOA Designer from Github.
node.body:
SOA Designer allows the modeling of service layer by focusing on the description of Component, Service, Contract used in the SOA paradigm.

This module uses a dedicated SOA metamodel provided by Obeo Network community and it implements the following diagrams:

  • SOA Diagram
  • Component Contract Diagam
  • DTO View
  • DTO / Entity Binding

This modeling tool can be used in conjunction with other designers:

  • Cinematc Designer for UI cinematic
  • Entity Designer for domain model
  • Graal Designer for UI interaction (entry specifications from business specifiers)

You can also generates your application with your own generators or apply this ready-to-use Spring generator: Acceleo JavaEE Generators.

This designer is free (open-source with EPL license).
You can easily modify it with Obeo Designer to adapt each diagram to your needs or combine it to your own DSL. To start customizing this module, just download a free trial version of the architect edition and import the source code of SOA Designer from Github.
